CA.description: The fun from the original nintendogs game returns with multiple breeds to choose from, accessories for your puppies and kittens to wear, and the ability to let your puppies and kittens train and compete in different challenges and activities. Puppies and kittens come to life as they react to your touch and voice. Share pictures, gifts and daily activities with other players using StreetPass. You can also download new game content, such as new Mii characters and items, via SpotPass. With more than 20 breeds to choose from, each puppy and kitten has unique coloring and personality possibilities. In this version, you can choose the Toy Poodle as a first pick!
